all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And the Lord called his people Zion, because they were of one heart and one mind, and dwelt in righteousness; and there was no poor among them.
Moses 7:18
Quote of the Day
"Everyone belongs to a family, whether you are a mother, father, daughter, son, grandchild, grandparent, aunt, uncle, brother, sister, or cousin."
Elder Ronald A. Rasband | 1 Oct 2025General Conference
